name: Troy Story - The Adventure Game - Episode 1
name_original: Troy Story - The Adventure Game - Episode 1
description:
Enter this game in 'way too early access' and see how Propellerhut Entertainment Network Independent Studios manage the situation with ease.

Great adventures! - Heroic battles! - Epic treasure! ...
...  didn't make it into the game due to budget restrictions.

But there are lots of other great features like  ... uhm ... well ...
... maybe they didn't manage the situation with ease ...
